Name: Roojack
About the game: What is more interesting than looking for a treasure with your best friend? Be prepared to handle the cuteness of Roojack world. Help Maple and Whippy to prove that one of the urban legends from Roojack was right. Legend says that a treasure was hidden somewhere. In that treasure, there exists something so powerful that can conquer the world. Maple and Whippy were raised hearing that story, now they're ready to start an adventure to find the treasure. Help them to fulfill their destiny, find the treasure, then conquer the Roojack world together (of course if the legend is real). Getting closer with the characters! Maple Maple is a peach, a cheerful girl, and have a lot of curiosity about her surrounding. From the first time she heard about the story, she promised herself that one day, she will be the first person who found the treasure of Roojack. Of course, she can't do it herself, so she takes her friend with her. Her name is... Whippy Whippy is a cupcake, has a huge spirit, and bravery. And yeah, who doesn't love cupcakes huh? That's why Maple asked her to be her partner in the wonderful journey. Key Features Play Together ~ With yourself. Solve the puzzle with your own help. If you fail sometimes, you know who to blame. 24 cute levels. Achievements
